name: Barinas
description: A vessel for holding Bar the Demon, with Barinas' soul as the lock. The Nightmare Knight is always resisting the power of the Demon God.

passiveSkill.name: Demon God
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Barinas dies, he returns to the hand, receiving {placeholder} ATK, and {placeholder} HP Max. Triggers 1 time per battle. DMG to Guardian class enemies increases by {placeholder}."}

uniqueSkill.name: Devil's Massacre
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Unleashes the lord of terror from the abyss. Attacks enemies in a cross pattern and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. For each enemy hit, increases ATK by {placeholder}  and DEF by {placeholder}."}

specialSkill.name: Bloody Sacrifice
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Smashes enemies with the touch of an ancient deity. Attacks an enemy column and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing Lifesteal Rate by {placeholder} when attacking.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Soul Pierce
normalSkill.description: Barinas pierces the opponent with his weapon. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Unleashes the lord of terror from the abyss. Attacks enemies in a cross pattern and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. For each enemy hit, increases ATK by {placeholder}  and DEF by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Barinas dies, he returns to the hand, receiving {placeholder} ATK, and {placeholder} HP Max. Triggers 1 time per battle. DMG to Guardian class enemies increases by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens6.skill: Smashes enemies with the touch of an ancient deity. Attacks an enemy column and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing Lifesteal Rate by {placeholder} when attacking.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
